summary: This document details an investigation involving Alfredo Rodriguez, an attorney representing four women suing Jeffrey Epstein. It discusses Rodriguez's attempts to sell documents related to the case and the legal obligations he has under a federal subpoena.

persons.name: Alfredo Rodriguez
persons.context: Alfredo Rodriguez is representing four female individuals suing Jeffrey Epstein and is involved in a legal matter concerning the production of documents.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the subject of the civil lawsuit filed by the four women represented by Alfredo Rodriguez.

connections.description: Alfredo Rodriguez is the attorney representing the women suing Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Contact and Subpoena Issued
events.description: Alfredo Rodriguez was contacted regarding a federal subpoena to provide documents related to the civil case against Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: Alfredo Rodriguez is representing four women suing Jeffrey Epstein.
Rodriguez attempted to sell documents he claims are pertinent to the civil case.
He was served with a federal subpoena to provide documents related to the case.
Rodriguez was demanding $50,000 for the documents.
The document mentions a consensual call to introduce an Under Cover Employee to complete the transaction.
